thread.title: Health insurance premiums being bumped up around the world
thread.title_full: Health insurance premiums being bumped up around the world

author: Peter Pallot
title: Health insurance premiums being bumped up around the world
text: Expat Health Health insurance premiums being bumped up around the world Tax rises relating to health cover are an additional burden on policyholders who for years have faced double-digit rises in premiums Cost of operations can vary widely: appendix removal averages $8,156 in the USA but $953 in Argentina Photo: Getty By Peter Pallot
